chart.title: Death rate from cardiovascular diseases
chart.subtitle: Reported annual death rate from [cardiovascular diseases](#dod:cvd) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
chart.note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
